name: Kiss Effect
description:
Space... Boundless space with secrets, beauty, and icy calm. At a distance of hundreds of light years, there is no shelter around except for your spaceship... It is your home, it is your place of relaxation and love...(^ ∇ ^ *) 🚀🪐

FEATURES

  • 🌑 Space girls
  • 🌒 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🌓 Beautiful artwork
  • 🌕 Animation scenes
  • 🌓 Relaxing music
  • 🌒 Puzzle game
  • 🌑 Comix story

    Easy win:
    Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


    In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.
